version_description:
This new update of Genshin Impact Pocket Helper brings changes to improve your journey in Teyvat. Get quick information on Characters, Weapons, Artifacts, Spiral Abyss and much more! Get custom reminder for your Resin,  Parametric and map collection. Track your wishes to plan for your next 5* character/weapon!

What's new in 1.01

Bug Fixes
- Fixed several crash points when viewing weapon/character.
- Fixed Weapon and Character calculator crashing when current and target are the same level. (Who would have thought this would happen? :( )

If you experience a crash in the app, please clear the cache by going to
Genshin Impact Pocket Helper > Settings > Clear Cache

We hope you enjoy this release! 
If you have comments / suggestions / improvements
Please contact us at contact@2iins.com

This new update of Genshin Impact Pocket Helper brings changes to improve your journey in Teyvat. Get quick information on Characters, Weapons, Artifacts, Spiral Abyss and much more! Get custom reminder for your Resin,  Parametric and map collection. Track your wishes to plan for your next 5* character/weapon!

What's new in 1.02

App Changes
- Added Kazuha custom icon

Bug Fixes
- Fixed crashes with Character and Weapon view
- Fixed Issue with Maps not clearing

If you experience a crash in the app, please clear the cache by going to
Genshin Impact Pocket Helper > Settings > Clear Cache

We hope you enjoy this release! 
If you have comments / suggestions / improvements
Please contact us at contact@2iins.com

This new update of GI Pocket Helper brings changes to improve your journey in Teyvat. Get quick information on Characters, Weapons, Artifacts, Spiral Abyss and much more! Get custom reminder for your Resin, Parametric and map collection. Track your wishes to plan for your next 5* character/weapon! Explore Inazuma easily with markers!

What's new in 1.8

App Changes
- Added the new map area for Enkonomiya
- New characters in custom app icon (Itto, Gorou, Shenhe, Yunjin and more)

App Improvements
- Added inline contact form to make contacting us easier
- Added extra information on how to fix issue with app not updated to the latest version

Bug Fixes
- Fixed a bug with login causing the app to crash

If you experience a crash in the app, please clear the cache by going to
GI Pocket Helper > Settings > Clear Cache

We hope you enjoy this release! 

If you have comments / suggestions / improvements
Please contact us at contact@2iins.com
